data.sentence: The word عَنْ comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to ride, embark, mount, be carried, go on board of a ship, voyage on (the sea), walk on (a road), commit (a fault). rakbun - caravan. rukban (pl. of rakib) - one who rides, mounted. rikab - camels. rakub - use of a beast for riding. mutarakibun - laying in heaps, ridden on one another, close growing, cluster over clustered, layer upon layer. tarkabunna - to pass on, rise, ascend.
data.sentence: The word لَتَرْكَبُنَّ comes from the root ر ك ب and is associated with the meanings: to ride, embark, mount, be carried, go on board of a ship, voyage on (the sea), walk on (a road), commit (a fault). rakbun - caravan. rukban (pl. of rakib) - one who rides, mounted. rikab - camels. rakub - use of a beast for riding. mutarakibun - laying in heaps, ridden on one another, close growing, cluster over clustered, layer upon layer. tarkabunna - to pass on, rise, ascend.

data.meanings: to cover/overwhelm, to make a thing match/conform/suit/correspond/agree with another thing, to hit/get right, become accustomed/habituated, a thing that is equal of another thing of any kind in its measure so that it covers the whole extent of the latter like the lid,  tibaqun - fittings, adapting, in order one above another, stages, layers, stories, series, plane, floors, stratum.
data.sentence: The word طَبَقًا comes from the root ط ب ق and is associated with the meanings: to cover/overwhelm, to make a thing match/conform/suit/correspond/agree with another thing, to hit/get right, become accustomed/habituated, a thing that is equal of another thing of any kind in its measure so that it covers the whole extent of the latter like the lid,  tibaqun - fittings, adapting, in order one above another, stages, layers, stories, series, plane, floors, stratum.

data.sentence: The word طَبَقٍ comes from the root ط ب ق and is associated with the meanings: to cover/overwhelm, to make a thing match/conform/suit/correspond/agree with another thing, to hit/get right, become accustomed/habituated, a thing that is equal of another thing of any kind in its measure so that it covers the whole extent of the latter like the lid,  tibaqun - fittings, adapting, in order one above another, stages, layers, stories, series, plane, floors, stratum.
